original_text: But since sexual immorality is occurring, each man should have sexual relations with his own wife, and each woman with her own husband.
korean_text: 음행을 피하기 위하여 남자마다 자기 아내를 두고 여자마다 자기 남편을 두라

sentences.original_text: But since sexual immorality is occurring
each man should have sexual relations with his own wife
sentences.korean_translation: 각 남자는 자기 아내와 성관계를 가져야 하며
